AllowGeneralAdmissionHint.Default: Enables the use of this location for setting up general admission tickets

ImportWizard_Line1.Default: This wizard will import accounts from a CSV file into the system.

ImportWizard_Line2.Default: The first line of the input file will be used to identify the field matching as follows:

ImportWizard_AccountCode.Default: used for matching existing account and doing an update instead of an insert

ImportWizard_CategoryCode.Default: the code of the category where this account is supposed to be inserted. If the code doesn't match an existing category, it will will added without category

ImportWizard_MFLookup.Default: where {NUMBER} matches the lookup item "Meta Field Type"

ImportWizard_ImportProcessNotFound.Default: Unable to find the import process, probably has expired.

Some of the selected items have already been paid.
Would you like to ignore these paymens (click 'Confirm')
or to abort the transaction (click 'Abort')?

AutoPayCredits.Default: Automatically pay credits using advanced payments

ErrorTotalCredit.Default: Payment amount value exceeds client remaining credit (max. %1)

VoucherNotExists_Create.Default: Voucher "%1" does not exists. Would you like to create a new one?

CannotDeleteActiveUsedTicketError.Default: Unable to delete reservation. There are some active used tickets

ContiguosSeqNumberError.Default: There is some not contiguous seq.numbers

SeatCategoryFlagHint.Default: When enabled, this attribute is considered also as a seat category

NegativeQuantityError.Default: Quantity cannot be a negative number

QuantityLowerThanUsedError.Default: Quantity cannot be lower than %1 because these seats have already been assigned.

NoPerformanceError.Default: Cannot hold if no performance is specified

PromoMinItemHelp.Default: For "mim. items count" consider only items having an amount greater or equal to "min. item amount"

PromoShopcartRemovedWarning.Default: These promotions have been removed from shopcart because are not applicable

DuplicatedEntityIdError.Default: Cannot create multiple resources over the same entity: %1

NotAvailableExt.Default: There is no more availability of the resource for today

ResourceNotFoundOnMediaError.Default: Resource not assigned to the account

FtpNotLogin.Default: Could not login to FTP server %s

FtpUpdFolderNotFound.Default: Updates folder not found on server: %s

WeekDaysHint.Default: If none is selected, all days are assumed to be active.

ExpRuleHint_NumOfDays.Default: The entitlement is valid "n" days after the purchasing date.

ExpRuleHint_NumOfHours.Default: The entitlement is valid "n" hours after the purchasing time.

ExpRuleHint_EndOfWeek.Default: The entitlement is valid until the end of the week of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the week, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

ExpRuleHint_EndOfMonth.Default: The entitlement is valid until the end of the month of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the month, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

ExpRuleHint_EndOfYear.Default: The entitlement is valid until the end of the year of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the year, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

ExpRuleHint_OneMonth.Default: The entitlement is valid one month starting from the purchasing date.

ExpRuleHint_OneYear.Default: The entitlement is valid one year starting from the purchasing date.

ExpRuleHint_DaysAfterFirstUsage.Default: The entitlement is valid from the purchasing date to "n" days after the first usage.

ExpRuleHint_HoursAfterFirstUsage.Default: The entitlement is valid from the purchasing time to "n" hours after the first usage.

TBUWRuleHint_NumOfDays.Default: The entitlement must be used within "n" days after the purchasing date.

TBUWRuleHint_NumOfHours.Default: The entitlement must be used within "n" hours after the purchasing time.

TBUWRuleHint_EndOfWeek.Default: The entitlement must be used within the end of the week of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the week, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

TBUWRuleHint_EndOfMonth.Default: The entitlement must be used within the end of the month of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the month, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

TBUWRuleHint_EndOfYear.Default: The entitlement must be used within the end of the year of the purchasing date. If the entitlement is purchased "n" days before the end of the year, the entitlement will roll over to the next.

TBUWRuleHint_OneMonth.Default: The entitlement must be used within one month starting from the purchasing date.

TBUWRuleHint_OneYear.Default: The entitlement must be used within one year starting from the purchasing date.

CrossoverRuleHint_SameDay.Default: The entry on an event of the same group will be considered a crossover reentry if it is done the same day.

CrossoverRuleHint_Unlimited.Default: The entry on an event of the same group will be always considered a crossover reentry

AlreadyVoidedError.Default: Cannot void a ticket with status '%1'

PrintError.Default: Ticket "%1" has been voided because failed to print with error: "%2". Do you want to retry?

NoValidTemplate.Default: No valid printer found for media template %1

MediaTemplateNotSet.Default: A media template has not been set for product [%1]

CannotVoidUsedTickets.Default: Unable to void already used products

CannotVoidBecauseHandedOver.Default: Unable to void product because it has handed over resources

WarnVoidUsedTickets.Default: Product %1 is already used. Do you confirm void?

ReservationPrintError.Default: All %1 printed tickets have been voided

NoValidTemplate.Default: No valid printer found for receipt template %1

ShakeStartHint.Default: Put all the buttons in a "draggable" state

ShakeStopHint.Default: Put all the buttons back to a normal state

FunctionsHint.Default: List of all the application functionalities

LockWorkstationHint.Default: Closes the current user session and prompt the log in screen

DatabaseDoesntNeedUpdate.Default: Database does not need to be updated

TrnCorrectionDateError.Default: Please select a date before today

SaleLockNotes.Default: Order "%1" is locked because in use

OrderLookupHint.Default: Lookup an order by its PNR or media code

TestNotAvailable.Default: Test not available for this plugin

ResMaintenance_DaysFromPerformanceHint.Default: Number of days before the earliest performance booked

ResMaintenance_DaysFromReservationHint.Default: Number of days after the reservation creation

ResMaintenance_VoidReservationHint.Default: Automatically delete all the reservations matching the criteria

ResMaintenance_AdminEmailHint.Default: Sends an email with a recap of the reservations matching the criteria

ResMaintenance_ClientEmailHint.Default: Sends an email to the reservation account for each reservation matching the criteria

OfflineExclude.Default: Do not include invalid offline usages

OfflineOnly.Default: Fire only for invalid offline usages
